Hi, my name’s Raghav Kukreti, I’m a final-year CSE undergrad at IIIT Delhi.

Currently, I am interning at Juspay, a payments company in Bangalore. My work there includes working on Data (R, Julia, Python), the Web (Purescript, RShiny) and Design (Sketch).

My interests are also aligned with my work, I’m currently researching generative music; a part of which I implemented at HackInOut 2019, called Rosaline. Parallel to this, I (used to) run a consultancy called DeepFlowData, which built data-centric solutions for pharmacovigilance applications.

Apart from this, I also experiment with making music and graphics. I upload semi-frequently on my SoundCloud under the moniker KUK₹ETI. All of my work, and media which I use frequently are listed in the side pane.

So tl;dr A collection of interesting notes, logs and research regarding the current state of affairs. Expect a lot of web, Julia, r/selfhosted and music

currently:

Working on RShiny, Wrapping up the blog, Expanding DeepFlow, SoTA Packages in Julia
